data.title: “We are all thinking the same thing”: The Da Vinci Code Director’s New Triple-Bombshell Movie Has Sydney Sweeney, Ana de Armas and Vanessa Kirby, Fans Hyped
data.meta_description: Filmmaker Ron Howard's new film starring an ensemble of Sydney Sweeney, Ana de Armas, and Vanessa Kirby has fans excited.
data.text:
Filmmaker Ron Howard, celebrated for movies like The Da Vinci Code, A Beautiful Mind, and Apollo 13, is returning with a new cinematic spectacle that’s already generating quite the buzz among fans.

Advertisement

The film, titled Eden, features a star-studded cast, including Jude Law, Vanessa Kirby, Ana de Armas, Sydney Sweeney, and Daniel Brühl. Recent reports have revealed that the survival thriller film has landed a spot for its premiere at the Venice Film Festival in September.

Ron Howard’s New Film Eden Set to Premiere at Venice Film Festival

Ron Howard’s new film Eden is based on two different accounts of a true story where a group of people deliberately abandon modern civilization to explore the true meaning of life and happiness on the Galápagos islands.

Advertisement

The filming was completed earlier this year. The movie is also described as a “darkly comedic tale of murder and survival” blending elements of comedy, absurdity, and sexiness with harrowing thrills and suspenseful moments as it explores the lengths to which people could go seeking happiness.

As per Screendaily, Eden has successfully secured international sales and distribution agreements. Starring Jude Law, Ana de Armas, Sydney Sweeney, Vanessa Kirby, and Daniel Brühl, the movie has secured a multi-territory distribution deal with Amazon Prime Video.

The report also states that Eden is anticipated to premiere at the Venice Film Festival in September. AGC Studios founder Stuart Ford has expressed excitement about the distribution deal and has expressed confidence in the film’s success and awards potential.

Advertisement

We are excited to have top distribution partners around the world on board for the fall festival launch of Eden and we’re feeling really confident about the film’s terrific box office and awards potential.

Not just the studio executive, but fans are also excited about the movie, especially given the star-studded cast that includes eye-catching talents like Sweeney and Armas. Reactions from fans have been highly enthusiastic.

Fans Thrilled to See Sydney Sweeney and Ana de Armas Together in Eden

The upcoming survival thriller from the acclaimed filmmaker Ron Howard has sparked significant excitement among fans, who took to X (Twitter) to share their anticipation for the film. People especially seemed excited about the prospect of seeing stars like Sweeney, Armas, and Kirby on-screen together.

Sharing their anticipation for the film, one X (Twitter) user said, “We are all thinking the same thing.” Many fans joined in the conversation, as they shared that they were excited to see the Euphoria star and others named Armas.

Advertisement

Some also seemed skeptical of the cast lineup, arguing, “Please get Vanessa Kirby away from these two overrated actresses,” sharing their preference for the Mission: Impossible star. Vanessa Kirby is known for starring in the Mission Impossible franchise along with her Oscar-nominated performance in the 2020 film Pieces of a Woman.

Advertisement

Advertisement

However, despite the skepticism, the plot of the film and its ensemble cast seem promising and could potentially attract the audience to theatres. Eden is scheduled to have its world premiere at the Venice Film Festival, however, the release date of the film is not available as of yet.
